Key Match Events: Ravindra Jadeja's brilliant direct hit to dismiss Steve Smith
Virat Kohli scored an unbeaten 85 off 94 balls
Ravindra Jadeja and Kuldeep Yadav shared five wickets to wreck the Australian innings
Mitchell Marsh dropped Virat Kohli on 12
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and chose to bat first
Australia expected a cakewalk after their spin-heavy attack bundled out India for 199
India's top four batsmen fell for ducks for the first time in an ODI
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli and KL Rahul masterminded the successful chase
Ravindra Jadeja and Kuldeep Yadav were praised for their bowling
India’s captain, Rohit Sharma, praised Kohli and Rahul as well as India’s bowlers
Australia captain Pat Cummins rued the drop of Kohli early in the chase
Miscellaneous Highlights: Three of India's top four batters fell for ducks inside two overs
Australia's David Warner and Steve Smith stabilized the innings with a 69-run partnership
India's spinners finished up the job to restrict Australia to a total well below par for this wicket
Australia's tail added 59 runs with the last three wickets
